CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains activity then starts to leave room
MOT picks up bag on rug and moves it aside
INV leaves room and shuts door behind her
MOT and CHI are sitting on rug facing each other with toys spread out around them
MOT holds cookie out to CHI
MOT lets go of cookie leaving it in CHIs hand
MOT reaches for jack+in+the+box and grabs it by the handle
CHI puts cookie in his mouth and holds onto the end of it
MOT looks at jack+in+the+box then at CHI
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
MOT glances at clown then looks back at CHI
MOT turns handle of jack+in+the+box again
CHI sucks on cookie then has it sticking out of his mouth
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box more
CHI takes cookie out of his mouth and drops it on rug and reaches for clown
MOT tilts clown back and looks at it then lets go of clown
<7> MOT grabs clown's head and pushes it back into jack+in+the+box
CHI watches what MOT is doing
CHI takes hold of lid and help MOT shut it
CHI drops teddy bear he was holding and takes hand off jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes jack+in+the+box towards CHI and picks up bear and puts it in her lap
MOT pushes jack+in+the+box towards CHI more
CHI takes handle of jack+in+the+box and pulls it towards him
MOT holds jack+in+the+box steady with one hand
CHI tries to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches for CHIs hand that turns handle then stops
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and moves it in front of CHI
CHI reaches for handle then pulls hand back . CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
MOT starts to turn handle of jack+in+the+box again
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then watches MOT
CHI puts his hands on lid of jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes CHIs hands away from jack+in+the+box
CHI takes hold of clown head and pushes it back not jack+in+the+box
MOT turns handle of jack+in+the+box some more
clown pops back out of jack+in+the+box
MOT stops turning handle and holds lid of jack+in+the+box open
CHI grabs clown and pushes it back into jack+in+the+box
CHI grabs lid of jack+in+the+box and starts to shut it
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box more and pushes clown into jack+in+the+box
CHI watches what MOT is doing
CHI pushes lid closed with MOT
CHI reaches for then feels handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of handle of jack+in+the+box then starts to crawl away
MOT picks up cookie off rug
CHI stops crawling and sits facing desk
MOT holds cookie in front of CHI
MOT still holds cookie out to CHI
CHI takes cookie from MOT and pushes MOTs hand away then crawls towards desk
MOT puts bear in other hand . <aft> MOT holds bear out to CHI
CHI starts to crawl under desk
MOT still holds bear out to CHI
CHI looks at bear MOT is holding out to him
MOT moves bear away from CHI
MOT fiddles with something under table
CHI in crawling position under desk
MOT leans towards CHI . MOT looks at CHI under the desk
CHI stays in same position under desk
MOT takes hold of jack+in+the+box and turns it around
CHI backs out from under desk
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then looks at cookie on his finger
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
jack+in+the+box makes music then clown pops out of jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks back at cookie on finger then looks around room
CHI bites cookie then takes it out of his mouth and plays with it
MOT looks at camera then at jack+in+the+box
<bef> MOT scoots over then takes hold of clown's head
MOT pushes clown into jack+in+the+box and shuts the lid
MOT sets jack+in+the+box aside then turns towards CHI
CHI holds cookie in both hands in front of him
MOT holds toy car in front of her and looks at it
MOT moves her bag near desk aside
MOT catches car and turns it right-side up then rolls it across rug
CHI sits and looks at toys on rug
MOT picks up rubber duck and squeaks it then holds it out to CHI still squeaking it
CHI reaches for duck and misses
CHI takes ducks from MOT and holds it in front of him
CHI waves duck around then holds it in front of him again looking at it
<aft> CHI crawls to car with duck still in one hand then knocks car towards MOT then sits down facing MOT
MOT rolls car back to CHI
CHI pushes car back to MOT
MOT sets the car upright and holds onto it
CHI watches car then looks towards MOT
<aft> CHI drops duck and crawls to MOT and sits next to her
MOT reaches for football and picks it up holding it in her hands in front of her
CHI reaches for duck but cannot reach and sits back
CHI takes football out of MOTs hands
CHI sits back and drops football
CHI reaches for football and gets hold of it
MOT nods her head at CHI
MOT nods head some more at CHI
MOT tries to catch ball and misses then grabs football
MOT hands football back to CHI
CHI takes football from MOT then throws it
CHI leans toward football and reaches for it
MOT makes throwing motion with football in hand
CHI takes football from MOT then gets a grip on it and throws it
MOT picks up football and tosses it back in CHIs lap then picks up rubber ducks
MOT sets duck down on rug
MOT tosses football from one hand to the other
MOT holds football in throwing position
MOT throws football then tries to catch it
CHI watches what MOT does with football
MOT picks up football and holds it up in front of CHI
MOT sets football in CHIs lap
CHI tries to pick up football
MOT slides book over in front of CHI
CHI picks up football and throws it at MOT
MOT looks at then reaches for the ball
MOT picks up football and tosses it to her other hand . <aft> MOT reaches for the car and rolls it to CHI
CHI looks at duck he is holding in his hands
MOT grabs jack+in+the+box and puts it in front of her on the rug
MOT tilts jack+in+the+box then sets it down and takes hold of its handle
MOT looks at jack+in+the+box then glances at CHI and looks back at jack+in+the+box
CHI holds football in throwing position
CHI picks up football and tosses it into MOTs lap
MOT pushes car away from her hand
CHI looks at duck he is holding
CHI looks at then reaches for the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI stuffs the clown into its box
MOT turns handle of jack+in+the+box then snaps the lid shut
MOT slides the jack+in+the+box toward CHI
<bef> CHI gets up on one knee then looks down into MOT's lap
MOT holds the football out to CHI
CHI takes the ball from MOT then holds it up over his head
CHI tosses the ball to MOT
<aft> CHI looks down at the duck in his hands
MOT catches the ball then hands it over to CHI
CHI throws the ball across the room
MOT holds the ball in front of CHI
CHI tries to pick up the ball with one hand
CHI tosses the ball in the air
MOT gets up on her knees and reaches for the ball then sits back and looks at CHI
CHI looks down then up at MOT
MOT holds the ball out toward CHI while looking across the room
<bef> CHI bangs on the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks down while holding the toy duck . <aft> CHI reaches down and touches the jack+in+the+box
INV explains the Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room
INV enters the room and explains Forbidden Object to MOT
MOT hands CHI a teddy bear to hold
INV places the object on the table
CHI looks at object . <aft> CHI leans his head on MOT's shoulder briefly then sits up straight
MOT holds the base of the object
CHI looks at the object while holding one hand up in the air . <aft> CHI leans over and rests his head on MOT's shoulder and sucks his thumb while still looking at the object
MOT looks from object to CHI
CHI looks at object then begins to reach for it
CHI looks up at MOT then reaches up and hits MOT on her hand
CHI looks in the direction of the INV
MOT holds out her hand in front of CHI
CHI moves his hand back while looking at the object
MOT holds her hand up between object and CHI
MOT moves her hand back between object and CHI
MOT clasps her hand over CHI's hand
CHI pulls his hand out from MOT's grasp then sucks his thumb
MOT dangles the toy necklace in front of CHI
CHI grabs the necklace then puts it on the table
CHI looks up then reaches toward the object with the necklace in his hand . <aft> CHI looks down
INV explains PCI boxes to MOT then leaves the room
<bef> MOT removed CHI from sassy seat as INV explained PCI boxes . CHI sits on the floor
MOT sits on the floor across from CHI
MOT tosses the ball up and down
CHI looks at MOT while holding on to his teddy bear
MOT holds the ball out toward CHI
CHI looks down at the ball in his lap
MOT holds out her hands in her lap while looking at CHI
CHI fidgets with the ball in his lap then lets it roll out of his lap out of camera range
CHI looks over toward MOT then down at the ball
MOT tosses CHI's teddy bear over by her bag
MOT watches CHI with hands outstretched
<aft> CHI sits under the table in partial view
MOT moves over a bit while looking at CHI
CHI remains under the table with the top of his head visible
<aft> MOT looks up at camera then over at CHI
CHI sits under the table doing something . A long period of silence
CHI remains seated under the table as the ball rolls into view
MOT bounces the ball several times then it rolls across the room toward CHI
CHI is in partial view of camera
CHI picks up the ball . CHI plays with the ball then it slips out of his hands and rolls across the floor
CHI crawls across the floor after the ball
MOT looks up at the camera then over at CHI
CHI sits on the floor and turns in MOT's direction
MOT extends her arms toward CHI
CHI rolls the ball toward MOT
MOT bounces the ball then it rolls over to CHI
CHI pushes the ball toward MOT
MOT bounces the ball then it rolls toward CHI
CHI pushes the ball then flaps his arms
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI flaps his arms then picks up the ball and tosses it in the air
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI sits across from MOT looking down
MOT rolls the ball to CHI again
CHI looks up at MOT briefly then down
<$=2> MOT rolls the ball to CHI
the ball rolls out of CHI's lap on its own
CHI tosses the ball across the room
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
<aft> MOT bounces the ball to CHI
CHI looks across the room toward the table
CHI crawls across the floor then sits with his back to MOT
CHI picks up the ball then rolls it across the room
MOT gets up on her knees and reaches for the ball
MOT moves across the room and puts the ball in its box
MOT places the box on the table
MOT gets a box off the table and puts it on the floor
MOT sits on the floor and looks down
CHI gets up on his knees and looks up
MOT takes the towel out of the box
CHI looks over his shoulder in MOT's direction
MOT unfolds the towel and holds it up
CHI looks forward and pulls himself up onto his feet using the table
MOT drapes the towel over her head
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT sits with the towel draped over her head
MOT lifts the towel and looks at CHI
MOT drapes the towel over her face
CHI stands across from MOT looking at her
MOT speaks from underneath the towel
MOT lifts the towel and looks at CHI
<bef> MOT drapes the towel over her face
MOT speaks from underneath the towel
CHI turns and looks down at the floor
CHI gets down on the floor and crawls past MOT toward some stuff on the floor
CHI sits on the floor across from MOT and looks up in MOT's direction
MOT lifts the towel and looks over at CHI
<bef> MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI lifts the towel off of his head
<aft> MOT picks up the towel off CHI's shoulder
CHI sits with his back to the camera looking across the room then looks up at MOT
MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI pulls the towel off his head
CHI looks around on the floor
MOT moves stuffed bear into the foreground
CHI turns around and crawls away from MOT
MOT puts the towel over the bear
CHI sits next to MOT with his back to the camera .
CHI looks around the room then down at something in his hand
CHI looks at MOT then behind him at something
MOT covers the bear with the towel
CHI looks down with his back to the camera
CHI holds the bear then looks over at MOT
MOT drapes the towel over her head
<aft> CHI pulls the towel off MOT's head
CHI pulls on the bag next to him on the floor
CHI sits on the floor next to MOT looking in MOT's direction
MOT moves the bag out of the way
CHI crawls past MOT then sits down and looks at MOT
MOT places the towel in its box
CHI reaches into the bag on the floor
CHI starts to remove contents of bag onto the floor
MOT looks over her shoulder at CHI
CHI looks at MOT and holds a cookie up in her direction
MOT reaches for a new box
MOT removes some paper from the box
CHI looks across the room then looks at the cookie box in his hands
MOT places some paper on the floor beside CHI
MOT places the crayons on the paper
CHI fidgets with the cookie box
CHI looks down at the cookie box in his hands
MOT reaches for the box in CHI's hands
MOT takes the box from CHI then opens the cookie box
MOT holds out a cookie to CHI
CHI takes the cookie then drops it
MOT fidgets with the cookie box
CHI looks in the direction of MOT
MOT holds the box out toward CHI
CHI reaches into the box and gets a cookie
MOT closes the cookie box and puts it away
MOT moves some of the paper
CHI puts the crayons on the floor
MOT picks up a crayon and colors
CHI tries to pick up the remaining crayons
<aft> CHI reaches for the crayon in MOT's hand
CHI takes the crayon from MOT
CHI puts some crayons on the paper
CHI picks up the crayons then puts them to his mouth
CHI takes a bite of his cookie
CHI looks down in the direction where MOT colors
CHI reaches down with crayon then puts it on the floor
CHI looks down at the cookie in his hand
CHI turns and reaches for something in MOT's bag
MOT removes something from CHI's hand
MOT moves the bag to the other side of the room
CHI looks at then reaches for the cookie box again
CHI has his back to the camera
MOT takes the cookie box from CHI and places it with the bag out of reach
CHI turns and looks across the room
MOT holds out a crayon toward CHI
CHI looks up at MOT then down
CHI crawls across the room past MOT
MOT looks over her shoulder in the direction CHI crawls
CHI is blocked from camera view by MOT
MOT takes the cookie box and opens it
MOT reaches for a cookie on the floor across the room then looks at CHI
<$=2> MOT's back is to the camera and CHI is blocked from camera view
MOT puts the cookie box off to one side
MOT places a piece of a cookie on the floor in front of her
MOT picks up CHI and gives him a kiss on the cheek
MOT sits CHI in her lap
CHI leans forward in MOT's lap
MOT puts crayons and paper away
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT sits CHI on the floor . <aft> MOT closes the box on the crayons and paper
<aft> MOT reaches up on the desk
CHI crawls away from MOT toward the far corner of the room
CHI is out of camera range
